Detailed Description

Plugin for RViz that allows to move a robot remotely over ROS.

const int64_t  payloadInt 
)
protected

Sends a command to the robot using the /RobotCommand ROS service.

Parameters
commandIdThe ID of the command that will be sent.
payloadFloatA floating point number that may be provided as data with the command.
payloadIntAn integer number that may be provided as data with the command.
